channel.title: Homes on Jimi Radabaugh
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Jimi Radabaugh

item.description: Professional Summary In my experience, the terms ‘Designer’ and ‘Developer’ depend on context, and I have been labeled both. The best term I have found to describe my unique skill set is Computational Designer. I have worked with PHP frameworks (Zend, Symfony), CMS platforms (WordPress, Drupal, OpenCart), modern static site generators (Hugo, which powers this site), version control (Git), and traditional graphic design tools (Photoshop, Illustrator).
